title: Virgin Galactic, Camber Energy, Bed Bath & Beyond, Jefferies: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Virgin Galactic got the all-clear to resume flights; Camber Energy is trending among retail traders
body:
Futures are up, suggesting the broader stock market could eke out gains for the third quarter despite recent whipsawed trading. Here’s what we’re watching before Thursday’s regular trading session gets going.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
